titles.en: Chapter 5 – (Making) the bequest for the inheritors

titles.ar: باب مَا لِلْإِنْسَانِ أَنْ يُوصِيَ بِهِ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهِ وَ مَا يُسْتَحَبُّ لَهُ مِنْ ذَلِكَ
titles.en: Chapter 6 – What is for the human being that he bequeaths after his death, and what is recommended from that

titles.ar: باب أَنَّ صَاحِبَ الْمَالِ أَحَقُّ بِمَالِهِ مَا دَامَ حَيّاً
titles.en: Chapter 4 – The owner of the wealth is more rightful with (the distribution of) his wealth for as long as he is alive
Chapter 5 – (Making) the bequest for the inheritors

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: حسن - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/17)
text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ أَبِي الْمَغْرَاءِ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الْوَصِيَّةِ لِلْوَارِثِ فَقَالَ تَجُوزُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Abu Al Magra, from Abu Baseer who said,
‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about the bequest for the inheritor. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: (it is) ‘Permissible’.
en.sarwar: 1. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ibn abu ‘Umayr from abu al-Mighra’ from abu Basir who has narrated the following: “I once asked abu ‘ Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, if one can make a will for the heir. He (the Imam) said, ‘It is permissible.”’

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (23/17)
text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ سَهْلِ بْنِ زِيَادٍ وَ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ جَمِيعاً عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ أَبِي وَلَّادٍ الْحَنَّاطِ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ (عليه السلام) عَنِ الْمَيِّتِ يُوصِي لِلْوَارِثِ بِشَيْ‏ءٍ قَالَ نَعَمْ أَوْ قَالَ جَائِزٌ لَهُ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Sahal Bin Ziyad, and Ahmad Bin Muhammad, both together from Ibn Mahbou, from Abu Wallad Al Hanaat who said,
‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about the dying one bequeathing for the inheritors with something. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Yes’, or he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘It is allowed for him’.
en.sarwar: 2. A number of our people have narrated from Sahl ibn Ziyad and Ahmad ibn Muhammad from all from ibn Mahbub from abu Wallad al-Hannat who has narrated the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, if one can make a will about something for the heirs. He (the Imam) said, ‘Yes,’ or he said that ‘it is permissible.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول كالصحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/18)
text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ إِسْمَاعِيلَ عَنِ الْفَضْلِ بْنِ شَاذَانَ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ بْنِ يَحْيَى عَنِ الْعَلَاءِ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ مُسْلِمٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ الْوَصِيَّةُ لِلْوَارِثِ لَا بَأْسَ بِهَا
الْفَضْلُ بْنُ شَاذَانَ عَنْ يُونُسَ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ بُكَيْرٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ مُسْلِمٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ نَحْوَهُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Ismail, from Al Fazal Bin Shazan, from Safwan Bin Yahya, from Al A’ala, from Muhammad Bin Muslim,
Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> has said: ‘The bequest for the inheritors, there is no problem with it’.
Al Fazal Bin Shazaan, from Yunus, from Abdullah Bin Bakeyr, from Muhammad Bin Muslim,
(The narrator says) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup>, approximately the same.
en.sarwar: 3. Muhammad ibn ’Isma‘il has narrated from al-Fadl ibn Shadhan from Safwan ibn Yahya from al-‘Ala’ from Muhammad ibn Muslim who has narrated the following: “Abu Ja‘far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘Making a will for the heir is not harmful.’” Al-Fadl ibn Shadhan from Yunus ‘Abd Allah ibn Bukayr from Muhammad ibn Muslim from abu Ja‘far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has narrated a similar Hadith.

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: موثق - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (23/18)
text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ بُكَيْرٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ مُسْلِمٍ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الْوَصِيَّةِ لِلْوَارِثِ فَقَالَ تَجُوزُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Al Hassan Bin Ali, from Abdullah Bin Bakeyr, from Muhammad Bin Muslim who said,
‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about the bequest for the inheritors, so he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Permissible’.
en.sarwar: 4. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from al-Hassan ibn Ali from ‘Abd Allah ibn Bukayr from Muhammad ibn Muslim who has narrated the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about making a will for the heir. He (the Imam) said, ‘It is permissible.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف على المشهور - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (23/18)
text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ سَهْلِ بْنِ زِيَادٍ عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ أَبِي نَصْرٍ عَنِ ابْنِ بُكَيْرٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ مُسْلِمٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ سَأَلْتُهُ عَنِ الْوَصِيَّةِ لِلْوَارِثِ فَقَالَ تَجُوزُ قَالَ ثُمَّ تَلَا هَذِهِ الْآيَةَ إِنْ تَرَكَ خَيْراً الْوَصِيَّةُ لِلْوالِدَيْنِ وَ الْأَقْرَبِينَ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Sahl Bin Ziyad, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Abu Nasr, from Ibn Bakeyr, from Muhammad Bin Muslim,

(The narrator says): ‘I asked Abu Ja’farasws about the bequest for the inheritors, so heasws said: ‘Permissible’. Then heasws recited this Verse [2:180] Bequest is Prescribed for you when death approaches one of you, if he leaves behind wealth for parents and near relatives’.
en.sarwar: 5. A number of our people have narrated from Sahl ibn Ziyad from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from ibn abu Nasr from ibn Bukayr from Muhammad ibn Muslim who has narrated the following: “I once asked abu Ja‘far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about making a will for the heir. He (the Imam) said, ‘It is permissible.’ He (the Imam) then recited this verse. ‘If he leaves good things the will is for parents and relatives.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/19)
text: أَبُو عَلِيٍّ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ الْجَبَّارِ عَنِ الْحَجَّالِ عَنْ ثَعْلَبَةَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ قَيْسٍ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ أَبَا جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الرَّجُلِ يُفَضِّلُ بَعْضَ وُلْدِهِ عَلَى بَعْضٍ قَالَ نَعَمْ وَ نِسَاءَهُ .

en.hubeali: Abu Ali Al Ashary, from Muhammad Bin Abdul Jabbar, from Al Hajaal, from Sa’alba, from Muhammad Bin Qays who said,
‘I asked him<sup>asws</sup> about the man who prefers some of his children over the others.  He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Yes, and his women’.
en.sarwar: 6. Abu Ali al-Ash ‘ariy has narrated from Muhammad ibn ‘Abd al-Jabbar fn al-Hajjal from Th’alabah from Muhammad ibn Qays who has narrated the following: “I once asked abu Ja‘far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about the case of a man who gives preference to certain ones of his children. He (the Imam) said, ‘Yes, he can do so, and his women.’”
